fields.name: categoryId
fields.doc: ID of the category of the type

fields.name: creatorUserId
fields.doc: User ID of the creator of the type

fields.name: updaterUserId
fields.doc: User ID of the person who was the last person to update the type

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.doc: Latest time at which the type has been updated

fields.name: eventId
fields.doc: Unique ID for the Kafka event

fields.name: traceToken
fields.doc: Trace token for this request, coming from upstream service
